testcase.classname: Buying items in shopping cart, single user
testcase.name: Julio buys items in his cart
testcase.system-out: Given a customer named "Julio Brown"........................................passed Given I am logged in as Julio...............................................passed Given I have at least one item in cart......................................passed When I try to buy items in my cart..........................................passed Then I should be asked for my payment method................................passed

testcase.classname: spell check an email before sending it too2
testcase.name: before sending an email - spell check should be triggered automatically
testcase.system-out: Given user click the send button............................................passed And something new to this part was added....................................passed When user is in send email dialog...........................................passed When user is in somthing....................................................passed Then spell check should be triggered and prompt user if errors were find....passed
